review.reviewText: Awesome service not what I expected would stay there again.

review.title: Modern by 1970 standards but clean and adequate.
review.reviewText: Conveniently close to the airport. Waited 45 minutes for a shuttle pickup that never showed in the evening. Fortunately I was going to the motel and not in a hurry. Finally called Uber for a quick $8.75 ride. 5:30 AM shuttle from motel to airport was fine.

review.title: It's a nice hotel that closes to airport.
review.reviewText: The hotel staff who was in charge of breakfast was not nice.  When I was making waffle, the vale of waffle bottle dropped and messed up. the hotel staff was very unhappy. That's just accident and something wrong. Overall the hotel is clean.
review.positiveRemarks: The location and room is big and clean, that's what we like.
review.negativeRemarks: the hotel staff might be more professional.
review.locationRemarks: The location is really convenient to restaurant and airport.

review.title: Convenient and reasonably priced
review.reviewText: The check in process was extremely fast, and all of the staff that I talked with were very friendly and helpful. The hotel was easy to find, had plenty of parking, and was very clean.

review.title: Quiet, close to airport, free shuttle!
review.reviewText: We simply needed a hotel close to airport as we were stopping over for one day to meet family in San Fran.  Super 8 was quiet, very clean, neat, very nice staff, no charge for parking!!!, continental breakfast, ice machines, vending soda, plenty of places in the area that deliver (try Seniore's Pizza - outstanding), hotel residents can use computer in lobby, oh! and did I say quiet and very clean??  It's a little gem.  Yes, it is right on El Camino Way, but you are not bothered by traffic.  We got hotel shuttle to airport at 4:30am - excellent and no problem.
review.positiveRemarks: Clean, very nice people working there, no parking fee, continental breakfast.  Noticed that they held luggage for a young couple! nice!
review.negativeRemarks: Maybe some curtains that closed all the way to keep out light - but this is NOT a BIG problem at all.
review.locationRemarks: We did not walk the area, but there are lots of restaurants close by that deliver, Walgreens, McD's. Fisherman's Wharf about an hour with traffic.

review.title: Free parking, free airport shuttle, and quiet room
review.reviewText: Free wifi, free airport shuttle, and free breakfast. Quiet air conditioner, perfect!
The rooms were clean and the beds were comfortable. Staff was very helpful and pleasant.

review.title: Handy for SFO
review.reviewText: Good priced hotel close to SFO. Very helpful front desk staff (Monica and Patricia especially). Good value compared to expensive nature of downtown San Francisco hotels. Only 20 minute walk to BART station for ride into city.
review.positiveRemarks: Overall good value for San Francisco - good standard budget hotel.
review.locationRemarks: Nice walk via 'downtown' San Bruno along the avenue to BART station.

review.title: Nice hotel by the airport if you need a night stay
review.reviewText: Hotel was easy to check in , right by airport , shuttle takes you to airport , and clean ! Be advised that planes are right near by !

review.title: Good for family.
review.reviewText: Convenient location to airport. Two king beds were great for family of four. Simple breakfast and airport shuttle also make travel with family less stressful.

review.title: Airport access was our need
review.reviewText: Pleasant facility in close proximity to SFO.  Breakfast hours were early enough, but space allotted was minimal.  Free shuttle to airport every half hour early morning, book it when you check in.  Ours was 10 min late for pickup, but we had allowed for that possibility.  Staff and rooms were perfect for our needs.  We would use them again.
review.negativeRemarks:
Space for more seating in breakfast area.
Make sure shuttle arrives on time to decrease anxiety of flyers.

review.title: Great for SFO
review.reviewText: Had a late check-in and early check-out, so really didn't do more that sleep and shower. Ground floor room was quiet, bed comfortable, and shuttle ran on-time. Really good option for layovers between flights.

review.title: Perfect for a budget hotel
review.reviewText: It was great and even better than its current 2 stat rating

review.title: convenient hotel
review.reviewText:
We found our room and bed very comfortable and close to airport, which is what we wanted.
The staff were congenial but a couple of complaints:  
1.  They failed to give us a wake-up call as requested.
2.  The desk should be more aware of time it takes for courtesy bus to get to airport as courtesy bus took over 1/2 hr to get to airport as we were first stop and then several other stops to pick up passengers.   This makes a difference for planning.  Fortunately we decided to take earlier courtesy bus just in case.

review.title: Close to airport.
review.reviewText: Only five minutes from rental car return. That's what we wanted with an early morning departure. Despite being on busy street, room was quiet. Plain vanilla room but clean. A bit of water leaking from toilet tank made for a wet spot on bathroom floor. Several restaurants nearby with a Chilis just a few blocks up the road.

review.title: Clean, comfortable, friendly
review.reviewText: Clean room. Comfortable bed. Staff was friendly. Close to the airport, which is convenient. Simple little continental breakfast was not great but good enough to start the day. The only negative is that we heard a couple airplanes take off or land around 1am. The hotel can't help that, but I thought that flying times were restricted. It's not a 5-star hotel, but for the price, it is great.

review.title: very convenient location at a great price
review.reviewText: we stayed here while visiting sites in san Francisco. off the beaten path but convenient to all areas airport downtown golden gate bridge
review.locationRemarks: airport was quick access and sites in sf

review.title: Close to the road  A bit noisy
review.reviewText: It was a great deal for an "economy" hotel.  I appreciated having the less expensive alternative on this particular journey.  The staff was great, friendly and helpful.  The room was clean and felt good.
review.locationRemarks: A few restaurants (local and chain) within walking distance.

review.title: Transit hotel
review.reviewText: Needed a place to crash due to flight transit.  Looked for hotels available near the airport, but prices were way up there.  This hotel seemed to be in reasonable price ranges when you had to spend 10 hour or so due to flight schedules.
review.positiveRemarks: Not too far away from airport.  Quick resoponse by hotel staff on request for shuttle pick up.
review.negativeRemarks: Rooms were a bit outdated and breakfast area was a bit small.

review.title: Short and sweet
review.reviewText: Just in town for the night wanted a hotel that was close to the airport and not $259.00 a night.  I went for a walk when I got there and had dinner at the Mexican restaurant next door.  The staff was very friendly. The airport shuttle by the way only goes to the terminals.  I needed to be dropped of at a building on airport grounds and he wouldn't do it.  That was disappointing.
